languages.text:
The target gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +1 additional temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every 2 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from damage, the target gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.
languages.original_text:
Цель получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} и +1 временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно за каждые 2 уровня тактического преимущества {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g}. При этом мастер-тактик теряет половину уровней тактического преимущества с округлением вверх.
До начала следующего хода мастера-тактика, когда цель, получая урон, теряет временное здоровье, она получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} в количестве, равном количеству потерянного временного здоровья.

traits.locale_text: The target gains +2 Temporary Wounds and +1 additional Temporary Wound for every 2 stacks of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has, but the Tactician loses half of the stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up). Until the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses Temporary Wounds from Damage, the target gains Momentum equal to the number of Temporary Wounds lost.

The target gains +2 Temporary Wounds and +1 additional Temporary Wound for every 2 stacks of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has, but the Tactician loses half of the stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up). Until the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses Temporary Wounds from Damage, the target gains Momentum equal to the number of Temporary Wounds lost.

The target gains +2 temporary wounds and +1 additional temporary wound for every 2 stacks of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has, but the Tactician loses half of their stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up). Until the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from damage, the target gains momentum equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.

The target gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +1 additional temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every 2 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from damage, the target gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.

languages.text:
Цель получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} и +1 временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} дополнительно за каждые 2 уровня тактического преимущества {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g}. При этом мастер-тактик теряет половину уровней тактического преимущества с округлением вверх.
До начала следующего хода мастера-тактика, когда цель, получая урон, теряет временное здоровье, она получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g} в количестве, равном количеству потерянного временного здоровья.
languages.original_text: The target gains +2 temporary wounds and +1 additional temporary wound for every 2 stacks of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has, but the Tactician loses half of their stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up). Until the beginning of the Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from damage, the target gains momentum equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.

traits.locale_text: Цель получает +2 временного здоровья и +1 временного здоровья дополнительно за каждые 2 уровня Тактического преимущества тактика. При этом тактик теряет половину уровней Тактического преимущества с округлением вверх. До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика, когда цель, получая урон, теряет временное здоровье, она получает моментум в количестве, равном количеству потерянного временного здоровья.

Цель получает +2 временного здоровья и +1 временного здоровья дополнительно за каждые 2 уровня Тактического преимущества тактика. При этом тактик теряет половину уровней Тактического преимущества с округлением вверх. До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика, когда цель, получая урон, теряет временное здоровье, она получает моментум в количестве, равном количеству потерянного временного здоровья.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}每有2层“战术优势”层数，就可以让目标获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}与+1额外临时生命值，随后战术专家失去一半的“战术优势”层数（向上取整）。
直到战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，每当该目标受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}失去临时生命值时，该目标都会获得与之相等的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The target gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +1 additional temporary wound for every 2 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.

traits.locale_text: 战术专家每有两层战术优势，就可以让目标获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}与+1额外临时生命值，随后战术专家失去一半的战术优势层数（向上取整）。 到战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，每当该目标受到伤害失去临时生命值时，该目标都会获得与之相等的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}。

languages.text:
El objetivo gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y +1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}herida{/g} temporal adicional por cada 2 acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica que posea el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}, pero este pierde la mitad de sus acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica (redondeando hacia arriba).
Hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del maestro táctico, cada vez que el objetivo pierda heridas temporales por haber sufrido daño, gana tanto {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} como la cantidad de heridas temporales perdidas.
languages.original_text:
The target gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +1 additional temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every 2 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from damage, the target gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y +1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}herida{/g} temporal adicional por cada 2 acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica que posea el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}, pero este pierde la mitad de sus acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica (redondeando hacia arriba). Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico, cada vez que el objetivo pierda heridas temporales por haber sufrido {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, gana tanto {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} como la cantidad de heridas temporales perdidas.

languages.text:
Das Ziel erlangt +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} und +1 temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunde{/g} pro 2 Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil, über die der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} verfügt. Dafür verliert der Meistertaktiker aber die Hälfte seiner Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil (aufgerundet).
Bis zum nächsten Zug des Taktikers gilt: Wenn das Ziel temporäre Wunden durch Schaden verliert, erlangt es diesem Verlust entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The target gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +1 additional temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every 2 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from damage, the target gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel erlangt +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} und +1 temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunde{/g} pro 2 Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil, über die der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} verfügt. Dafür verliert der Meistertaktiker aber die Hälfte seiner Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil (aufgerundet). Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Taktikers gilt: Immer wenn das Ziel temporäre Wunden durch {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verliert, erlangt es diesem Verlust entsprechende {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.

languages.text:
La cible bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessure{/g} temporaire supplémentaire par tranche de 2 cumuls d'Avantage tactique dont dispose le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, mais ce dernier perd alors la moitié de ses cumuls d'Avantage tactique (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur).
Jusqu'au début du tour suivant du maître tacticien, chaque fois que la cible subit des dégâts qui lui font perdre des blessures temporaires, elle obtient une {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} égale au nombre de blessures temporaires perdues.
languages.original_text:
The target gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +1 additional temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every 2 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from damage, the target gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.

traits.locale_text: La cible bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et de +1 blessure temporaire supplémentaire par tranche de 2 cumuls d'Avantage Tactique acquis par le Tacticien, mais celui-ci perd la moitié de ses cumuls d'Avantage Tactique (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur). Jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Tacticien, chaque fois que la cible subit des dégâts qui lui font perdre des blessures temporaires, elle acquiert une {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} égale au nombre de blessures temporaires perdues.

languages.text: ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が+2、および{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}に付与されている戦術的優位のスタック2ごとに+1増加する。ただし、戦略の達人は戦術的優位のスタックを半分（切り上げ）失う。 戦略の達人の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ターゲットが一時体力を{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}によって失った時、そのターゲットは失った一時体力の量に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text:
The target gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +1 additional temporary wound for every 2 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が+12、および戦術家に付与されている戦術的優位のスタック2ごとに+1増加する。ただし、戦術家は戦術的優位のスタックを半分（切り上げ）失う。 戦術家の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで、ターゲットが一時体力をダメージによって失った時、そのターゲットは失った一時体力の量に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得る。

languages.text:
Hedef, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen'in{/g} sahip olduğu her 2 taktiksel avantaj birikimi için ve +1 ilave geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır ancak Usta Taktisyen, taktiksel avantaj birikiminin yarısını kaybeder (yukarı yuvarlanır).
Usta Taktisyen'in bir sonraki turunun başlangıcına kadar hedef, hasar alarak her geçici sağlık puanı kaybedişinde bu kaybedilen sağlık puanına eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text:
The target gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +1 additional temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every 2 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their stacks of tactical advantage (rounded up).
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, whenever the target loses temporary wounds from damage, the target gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to the number of temporary wounds lost.
